original_text: And the king of Sodom went out to meet him after his return from the slaughter of Chedorlaomer, and of the kings that were with him, at the valley of Shaveh, which is the king's dale.
korean_text: 아브람이 그돌라오멜과 그와 함께 한 왕들을 쳐부수고 돌아올 때에 소돔 왕이 사웨 골짜기 곧 왕의 골짜기로 나와 그를 영접하였고

sentences.original_text: And the king of Sodom went out to meet him
after his return from the slaughter of Chedorlaomer
and of the kings that were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 왕들을 죽이고 돌아온 후에
